text: The women's team soft tennis event was part of the soft tennis programme and took place on August 31 and September 1, at the JSC - Tennis Court. Japanese women's team clinched the gold medal in this event after beat the South Korean team in the final. ==Schedule== All times are Western Indonesia Time (UTC+07:00) {|class = "wikitable" style="text-align:center;" ! width=220|Date ! width=50|Time ! width=150|Event |- | Friday, 31 August 2018 || 09:00 || Preliminary round |- | rowspan=3|Saturday, 1 September 2018 || 09:00 || Quarterfinals |- | 11:30 || Semifinals |- | 15:00 || bgcolor=ffffcc|Final |} ==Results== ===Preliminary round=== ====Group A==== ====Group B==== ====Group C==== ===Knockout round=== ====Quarterfinals==== ====Semifinals==== ====Final==== ==Non-participating athletes== * * == References == == External links == *Official website *soft-tennis.org Category:Soft tennis at the 2018 Asian Games
title: Soft tennis at the 2018 Asian Games – Women's team
